teacher_info.teaching_style:
My lessons are aimed to your needs and results .
I prefer using target language during the lessons, but if you need explanations, I would find the easiest way.
My lessons have some plan. Still, I am quite flexible if it is needed.
Instant Tutoring could have 
- conversations, 
- role-plays, 
- discussions (ex.video), 
- consultations (ex.Grammar), 
- pronunciation corrections (ex. reading a text), 
- help with your HW and much more.
Professional Courses either have their own plan and course book or they could be tailored according to your needs. 
These lessons help you to improve your 
- Grammar, 
- Vocabulary, 
- Pronunciation, 
- Writing, 
- Reading and 
- Speaking 
skills systematically.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice/ Consultations
pro_course_detail.description:
These lessons could be organised as follows:
1. Unconditional talking. We just talk about everything you are interested in: news, politics, music, travelling, relationships and so on.
2. Your talking. We follow any textbook or course you are practicing on your own. I help you with conversation practice for your lessons and explain what you want.
3. My choice.The talk could be based on a textbook or course of my choice.
4. Consultations. We can
> look through grammar forms and use, where you need explanation
> do together or check your school or university HW,
> fill in a form or write a letter,
> translate something,
> do anything you need for learning or using your target language.

teacher_info.introduction:
Hello everybody! I am from Belarus but now I live in Italy. I can help you to learn Russian language! What about good reasons to learn Russian? 
1.Open up a world of job opportunities. 
2. Give your brain a boost. 
3. Establish deep connections and cross cultural friendships. 
4.Get an outsiders perspective about your own culture. 
5. Become more interesting meet more interesting people. 
6.Stay smart in touristed areas. 
7. Become a better learner. 
8. Conquer your fear of "looking stupid". 
9. Bring out your inner Mr Spock
10. Enjoy works of art in their original language. 
So what are you waiting for?!!! Contact me! 

Buongiorno a tutti GLI italiani! Finalmente avete trovato il profilo che vi aiuterà ad imparare la lingua russa, perché è più semplice imparare se avete un insegnante che parla anche la vostra lingua. Ho una grande esperienza nell'apprendimento di lingue straniere, sono sicura che posso mettere al vostro servizio questa mia esperienza E’ molto importante parlare frequentemente con persone di madrelingua . Per me vivere in Italia mi ha aiutato molto ad imparare l’italiano Non pensate tanto e contatami subito. Come hai detto Michel de Montaigne "Ci troviamo meglio in compagnia di un cane conosciuto che di un uomo il cui il linguaggio è sconosciuto!" Vi aspetto!

course_info.trial_description:
Hi! My name is Ekaterina and I teach Russian for beginners. This trial lesson will be a good chance to meet each other and set our learning goals. 
If you have never learned Russian before, I suggest that during this lesson we learn some basic phrases and how to read Russian. And if you've already had some experience with the language we will have some speaking practice. Or maybe you have a particular learning request, just let me know about it. 
Can't wait to meet you!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for kids
pro_course_detail.description:
During our classes we will use a colorful textbook, play games and do interactive online exercises. We will focus on speaking the language, as well as learning how to read in Russian. These fun and energetic classes will be a good additional language practice for bilingual children.
Please note that I teach kids aged 6-10 y.o.

pro_course_detail.title: General course (A1-С1)
pro_course_detail.description:
If you have never learned Russian before, we will start with some basic phrases and learn how to read the Russian alphabet. I will show you that it is not that hard :)

We will have listening and speaking practice, that would allow us to use new vocabulary and grammar in conversation starting from the first lessons. I prefer the communicative language teaching approach and I believe that it is crucial to practice speaking a target language starting from the very beginning.

I will provide all the materials for the class and give you some homework if you want to (I really hope you do!)

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian (B1-C2)

teacher_info.intro:
Hello! My name is Marina. I was born and raised in Russia. I’ve been teaching English for 10 years, and I’m absolutely in love with it! Since I remember, I've always been interested in learning languages and meeting new people. Learning a new language might be so inspiring and encouraging to open your mind to the world. That is why I would love to help you with both the English and Russian languages. I want to be that teacher who is a guide, a friend who can open students up and show how amazing it can be, speaking a different language and achieving any goal they have. 

 I’ve graduated from the State Social and Humanitarian University. I studied linguistics and intercultural communication.
teacher_info.short_signature: In love with languages and making jokes
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello! My name is Marina. I was born and raised in Russia. I’ve been teaching English for 10 years, and I’m absolutely in love with it! Since I remember, I've always been interested in learning languages and meeting new people. Learning a new language might be so inspiring and encouraging to open your mind to the world. That is why I would love to help you with both the English and Russian languages. I want to be that teacher who is a guide, a friend who can open students up and show how amazing it can be, speaking a different language and achieving any goal they have. 

 I’ve graduated from the State Social and Humanitarian University. I studied linguistics and intercultural communication.
teacher_info.about_teacher: My main teaching purpose is to provide you with a safe environment where you can make mistakes and learn and develop all the skills to communicate effectively and achieve your goals. I am supportive, and I like the idea of using positive reinforcement. It’s a great tool to motivate you and help see your results, even small ones. Because sometimes we’re too focused on the final goal, we don’t see all the work we’ve done. I also like encouraging you to apply the language they learn because it helps break the language barrier and acquire it quickly.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I believe that every aspect of the language is important, so we will talk about anything you are interested in, practice reading and writing, watch interviews and different videos, and listen to music. It will help you gain confidence, enrich your vocabulary, memorize grammar patterns and improve your listening skills. Our main goal is to enjoy the language and become fluent and accurate. I  use authentic materials, so you learn the real-life language.

course_info.trial_description:
In this lesson, we will get to know each other, find out your level and set your goals for our future lessons.

На этом уроке мы с вами познакомимся, определим ваш уровень и установим цели для дальнейших занятий.

pro_course_detail.title: English conversational practice
pro_course_detail.description: Better your English with conversation practice. I believe having a conversation in the target language is the best way to gain confidence and reach fluency. We can talk about anything you're up to.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Conversation Practice. Разговорная практика Русского языка
pro_course_detail.description:
Better your Russian with conversation practice. I believe having a conversation in the target language is the best way to gain confidence and reach fluency. We can talk about anything you're up to. Feel free to ask your questions during the lesson, and I will be more than happy to answer them!

Совершенствуй свой Русский в разговорной практике. Я искренне верю, что разговор на изучаемом языке - лучший способ стать увереннее и достичь беглости речи. Мы можем говорить на любые интересующие вас темы. Не стесняйтесь задавать мне вопросы в процессе занятия, я с удовольствием на них отвечу!

pro_course_detail.title: General English
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you need to catch up on grammar that still troubles you?  Do you need to improve your listening skills? Do you want to enrich your vocabulary? Or maybe do you want to start watching tv shows in English? Here is the solution,
 I will provide you with a detailed explanation and lots of practice, be ready to talk 80% of the time. I will guide and help you achieve all your goals.

pro_course_detail.title: Basic Russian for traveling. Базовый Русский для путешествий
pro_course_detail.description:
If you're traveling to Russia, you can use these lessons to brush up on the knowledge you already have or learn all the words and expressions you might need.

Если вы планируете путешествие в Россию и хотите освежить свои знания или же узнать все необходимые слова и выражения, то эти уроки для вас.

pro_course_detail.title: English Grammar
pro_course_detail.description: These lessons are focused on helping you understand and improve your English grammar. I will provide a clear explanation using the best books available. If you're still struggling with the articles or grammar tenses, I will be happy to help.

teacher_info.intro:
Меня зовут Алеся. Я - носитель русского языка. Я родилась в Беларуси, год назад переехала в Европу. Понимаю и говорю на английском и чешском языках. 
 У меня разные интересы. Я люблю учить языки (сейчас польский и корейский), изучать культуры разных стран, популярную науку. Я поддерживаю любые новые идеи. 
 Я очень общительная. 

My name is Alesia. I am a native Russian speaker. I was born in Belarus and moved to Europe. I can understand and speak English and Czech. 
 I have different interests. I like to travel, learn languages, other cultures, popular science. And I always  support any new ideas.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Моя цель научить вас не бояться разговаривать. Я являюсь студенткой языковых курсов, поэтому хорошо понимаю все сложности студента, который учит язык. 

 I am a student of language courses, so I understand well all the difficulties of a student who is learning a language. I have been teaching Russian for a relatively short time.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Я - человек, с которым вы можете практиковать свой разговорный русский. Каждый урок это своеобразное интервью, где я задаю вопросы, на которые сложно дать короткий ответ. 
 Иногда мы вместе читаем интересные короткие статьи или слушаем песни популярных российских исполнителей.
  Как я уже говорила, я всегда готова к вашим предложениям.

course_info.trial_description:
План:
- определим ваши цели
- выберем что будем тренеровать на уроке (чтение и понимание, аудирование, говорение)
- выберем методы (flash-карточки, игры, диалог, викторины)
- договоримся, как и когда будем проводить уроки 

Это всего лишь пробный урок. Не думайте, решайтесь!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Lesson
pro_course_detail.description:
На уроке русского языка мы будем тренеровать разговорный навык, дискутировать на разные темы, читать статьи, разбирать тексты современных песен, смотреть отрывки из классических русских комедий. 

Приветствуются любые ваши предложения, я стараюсь быть мобильным учителем и расширять количество форматов в котором я могу работать.
 
Жду вас на своём уроке. Не думайте, решайтесь!

pro_course_detail.title: Говорим по-русски
pro_course_detail.description:
Just talking

На уроке будем: 

- просто разговаривать
- пить чай

За 10 минут до конца:

- сделаем работу над ошибками
- ученик получит рекомендации

teacher_info.intro:
I am from Saint Petersburg, Russia and I am a native speaker of both Russian and English. Throughout my childhood I had lived in Tanzania, where I learned to speak fluent Swahili. I have studied languages (German and Spanish) and understand the difficulties you’ll face learning a foreign language so I am patient and friendly.  I currently live in Barcelona, where I speak Spanish and Catalan on a daily basis.

I decided to start teaching because I enjoy meeting new people and learning more about different cultures and lifestyles.  My lessons are quite informal as my main aim is to have you speaking as much as possible because that’s the best way to learn.
teacher_info.short_signature: Certified TEFL teacher with 4 years teaching experience.
teacher_info.about_me:
I am from Saint Petersburg, Russia and I am a native speaker of both Russian and English. Throughout my childhood I had lived in Tanzania, where I learned to speak fluent Swahili. I have studied languages (German and Spanish) and understand the difficulties you’ll face learning a foreign language so I am patient and friendly.  I currently live in Barcelona, where I speak Spanish and Catalan on a daily basis.

I decided to start teaching because I enjoy meeting new people and learning more about different cultures and lifestyles.  My lessons are quite informal as my main aim is to have you speaking as much as possible because that’s the best way to learn.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Living in Africa has helped me to interact with people from different countries. I have been teaching languages for about 3 years. I had a lot of international students from all over the world. I am very fun,friendly and outgoing and always encourage my students to speak as much as possible and entirely lose their fear of making a mistake (they are an essential part of learning any language!). We can do casual classes, where we mostly speak about various topics, or if you need to prepare for assessments such as IELTS and CAE, we can do speaking in the exam format. In the previous years I have prepared several students to do these exams and they all passed with flying colors.
teacher_info.teaching_style: My lessons are based on conversation. I have deep knowledge in Russian, English, Spanish and Swahili grammar and am able to help my students evaluate their academic level and develop it further. Alongside, I am able to prepare you for language exams, help with homework and even give my own, solve grammar exercises or simply help you prepare for a holiday in a country where you will need to speak English, Russian, Spanish or Swahili.

teacher_info.intro: 大家好，我叫铁木，是一个土生土长的俄罗斯人，也是一名专业的俄语老师。我毕业于新西伯利亚师范大学，专业是汉语教育。我教了四年汉语. 现在我正在读研究生，专业是对外俄语。我的爱好是运动、音乐、学习外语， 我也对政治感兴趣。
teacher_info.about_me: 大家好，我叫铁木，是一个土生土长的俄罗斯人，也是一名专业的俄语老师。我毕业于新西伯利亚师范大学，专业是汉语教育。我教了四年汉语. 现在我正在读研究生，专业是对外俄语。我的爱好是运动、音乐、学习外语， 我也对政治感兴趣。
teacher_info.about_teacher: 因为我会说中文，所以可以用中文仔细地为你解释。如果你已经会说俄语，我们可以练习口语，提高你的口语水平，在这个过程中我可以帮你纠正语法，以及发音错误。如果你是初学者，我们也可以从基础学起。课堂上，我会使用最有效的俄语教材和教学方法。
teacher_info.teaching_style: 我的本科专业是外语老师，我学了教学方法。我觉得发音、语法、口语、阅读、书写都非常重要，对每个语言方面很重视。

teacher_info.intro:
UPD. I teach Ukrainian language.  Russian just for current students. 
Thank you for understanding.  
*****************************
Мене звати Юлія, за професією я журналіст. Я закінчила Інститут журналістики у м. Києві, працювала на радіо та у великому видавничому домі. Уже шість років ми з родиною живемо у Словенії. Вивчаючи словенську мову, я на собі відчула важливість живого спілкування з носіями мови. Як відомо, для вивчення мови необхідне максимальне занурення - треба слухати, читати, розмовляти. Я залюбки допоможу вам заговорити українською. Ми будемо спілкуватися на різноманітні теми. Я запрошую вас на наші заняття, з радістю чекаю на нашу зустріч!

teacher_info.intro:
My name is Laima. 
I am a native Romanian speaker from the Republic of Moldova and also speak Russian as my mother tongue. I have a Licence in Philology of Modern and Classical Languages. I have been working  for 12 years as an English and French teacher in a state lyceum with forms from 1st-12th  (6-17 year-old students) and also teach Romanian and Russian as second languages to foreign volunteers. I taught a course of English to the Administration Staff of the Local Business Incubator, Town of Leova. I give private off- and on-line lessons to students of different ages and levels. 
Dear Student, I would like to share my knowledge and experience with You!
teacher_info.about_me:
My name is Laima. 
I am a native Romanian speaker from the Republic of Moldova and also speak Russian as my mother tongue. I have a Licence in Philology of Modern and Classical Languages. Dear Student, I would like to share my knowledge and experience with You!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I love my job. 
My aim is to make my students enjoy learning the language and feel free and confident when using it. Each student is a personality that’s why I have an individual aproach based on their interests and needs, and I try to find the most efficient methods and make classes funny and relaxed.  My lessons are based on the four skills: reading, writing, listening and speaking.
I am ready to help You, my Student, with anything you need.
I am passionate about playing the violin, watching National Geographic, playing chess and other intellectual games. I also spend a lot of time studying professional articles and books and I enjoy creating my own  teaching materials for classes.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
The process of teaching-learning a language is like a ”cuisine” and how good it is depends on the chef... 
During our lessons I will teach you how ”to prepare different dishes”  (this is how to communicate in different situations so that you and the other participants can feel good and comfortable). We will use various ingredients and spices, such as grammar rules and vocabulary, pronunciation and intonation, and  I will provide you with the necessary ”kitchen tools”- the necessary techniques to help you with all that work.
I am here to encourage and help you do great things: speaking a new language, descovering new cultures and, of course, developing your personality.  Are you ready?  :)

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I don't like the word teacher. The purpose of the teacher is simply to give the material. In Russian there is a word "mentor". I like it more. The mentor does not just give the material, but he explains why this or that rule works.
In 2010, I began my training in the correct delivery of speech, the correct conduct of a conversation or speech, as well as oratory in a well-known school. I study at this school to this day. But now I do it by adding English. I want to share this knowledge with other people and I am sure that a person who wants to learn Russian will find this knowledge useful.
teacher_info.teaching_style: There is nothing difficult in the classroom. As I said in the introductory video, my goal is practice. Many times the word is practice. The student can either choose the topic himself or entrust it to me. But it is better for the student to speak on a topic that will be of interest to him. In the lessons we can also use teaching materials and manuals, if necessary.

course_info.trial_description:

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation ONLY in Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
RU: Этот урок подойдет тем, у кого уже есть базовые знания русского языка. На этом занятии мы постараемся не использовать другой язык. Только русский. Это будет сложно, но эффективно. По себе знаю, что практика - это лучший учитель. 

EN: This lesson is suitable for those who already have basic knowledge of the Russian language. In this lesson, we will try not to use another language. Only Russian. It will be difficult but effective. I know from my own experience that practice is the best teacher.
Сonversational practice, reading and discussing texts, grammar, new words and expressions. Homework if you wish.

EN: This lesson is intended for those who know Russian at an intermediate or below-intermediate level. We will speak on simple topics in simple language. It may sometimes be appropriate to use English.
Сonversational practice, reading and discussing texts, grammar, new words and expressions. Homework if you wish.

pro_course_detail.title: Preparation for public talk in Russian

course_info.trial_description: Определение целей и задач ученика. Обсуждение программы и длительности обучения.  Defining the goals and objectives of the student. Discussion of the training program and duration of training.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский язык для начинающих / Russian language for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
Беседа (практический урок).

Пример урока: 

Ситуация: в ресторане / в кафе / в столовой.
Грамматика: 
- числительные;
- существительные с числительными (2 падеж);
- отработка полученных знаний (упражнение на закрепление). 

Лексика: 
- введение необходимой лексики;
- чтение образцов диалогов;
- закрепление. 

Практика: 
- продуцирование диалога (на основе представленного материала). 

Домашнее задание предусмотрено: отработка грамматических конструкций (упражнение). 

Conversation (practical lesson).

The example: 

Situation: in a restaurant / in a cafe / in a dining room.
Grammar: 
- numerals;
- nouns with numerals (genitive);
- working out the acquired knowledge (an exercise to consolidate). 

Vocabulary: 
- introduction of the necessary vocabulary;
- reading sample dialogs;
- pinning. 

Practice: 
- production of dialogue (based on the presented material). 

Homework is provided: working out grammatical constructions (exercise).

pro_course_detail.title: Подготовка к устной части тестирования по русскому языку / Preparation for the oral part of the TORFL
pro_course_detail.description:
The example: 

Объяснение критериев оценки. 
Определение слабых мест в речи ученика.
Работа над каждой частью устного экзамена. 
Предоставление материалов: аудио, видео, текстов.

Отработка речевых навыков.

Большое внимание на уроке уделяется раскрепощению ученика (снятию языкового блока).

Explanation of the evaluation criteria. 
Identification of weak points in the student's speech.
Work on each part of the oral exam. 
Provision of materials: audio, video, texts.

Practicing speech skills.

Much attention in the lesson is paid to the emancipation of the student (removal of the language block).

teacher_info.intro: I live in the city of Pavlovsky Posad, it is not far from Moscow. I have a higher pedagogical education. I graduated from the Moscow Pedagogical Institute with a degree in History and Social Studies. I love Russian classical literature, painting, theater and cinema. My teaching experience is 25 years, I also worked in the library. Since 2016, I have been teaching Russian as a foreign language online, and in 2017 I entered the course “Russian as a foreign language” at the Institute of Russian Language and Literature, Lomonosov Moscow State University.
teacher_info.short_signature: Я сертифицированный преподаватель русского языка как иностранного с 2017. До встречи на уроке!
teacher_info.introduction: Hello! My name is Natalia. I am native Russian speaker and I was born and grew up in a small town called Pavlovsky Posad, which is located next to Moscow and world-famous for its Russian shawls. I have a Master's degree in Education. I graduated from the Moscow Pedagogical Institute with a degree in history and social studies. I have 25 years of teaching experience. I also worked in a library. My passions are russian classical literature, theater and cinema. How will my lessons look like? The simple answer is it depends on you:) I would divide my lessons into three types: 1. Informal tutoring. That is just speaking about topics you are interested in. 2. Learning Russian by: - reading stories, novels or articles - watching movies or footages on youtube - listening audio books or podcasts 3. Learn Russian grammar I've got awesome teaching materials for different levels. Learning grammar we will use different types of activities to make our lessons the most interesting and useful for you. Online tools I use: - Skype/Google Hangouts video/audio calls - Sharing screen for demonstration teaching materials - Google documents for convenient collaboration work on written assignments - Power Point presentations of different interesting topics and grammar rules A little bit more about me: I like skiing in the forest during winter and I adore biking in the summer. I really enjoy talking to new people. There are so many things which we could discuss. so I'm excited to find new students from around the world! Russian is so hard and beautiful. It is a language of Turgenev, Pushkin, Dostoevsky, Tolstoy, Chekhov. It is hard to learn but very interesting. During my lessons I speak only in Russian. It might seem like a challange at first glance for beginners, but the only way to learn Russian is to speak Russian. Whatever Russian language level you have I am sure that we will have lovely natural and useful conversation.

pro_course_detail.description:
Мы будем говорить на темы, которые Вам интересны. Мы можем использовать учебные материалы ЮLang или просто общаться. Буду рада Вас видеть на уроке:) До встречи!

ЮLang
https://youlang.ru

 These are high-quality, modern and beautifully designed lessons of Russian as a foreign language.

At the heart of the lessons are the articles of modern Internet publications. YouLang lessons cover a wide range of topics: society, culture, science, education, psychology, sports, business and much more.
At YouLang, you can choose your own lesson topic. Topics are selected in such a way that you want to read the text and be sure to express your point of view. After all, when the topic is concerned, you really want to share your thoughts, using the most accurate words and phrases to be understood. At such moments, shame and fear go away. You should not be afraid to go into a dead end or make too many mistakes. I will be there to help you.

We will use all the modern tools available via video link that will make the lesson as efficient and interesting as possible.

pro_course_detail.title: Lessons in Russian classical literature B2-C2
pro_course_detail.description:
My dear students, present and future! I invite you to the lessons on the works of the great Russian writers and poets: Tolstoy and Dostoevsky, Bunin and Turgenev, Chekhov and Pushkin.
Russian classics is a very short time. Someone very wittily remarked that all Russian classics could have been born by a single woman since 1779, the year Pushkin was born.
In classics in Russian classics, I use only authentic texts. In the classroom, I learn to understand the situation of the text. You will learn how to highlight the main components of the artistic text situation: the subject (Who?), Event (What? How?), Place (Where?), Time (When?)
 Even if there are a lot of unfamiliar words in the text, you will understand what is happening, how it is happening, when and where.
These lessons will help you start reading the Russian classics on your own.
For students owning level B (2), C (1), C (2) lessons about the characters, actions of heroes, about the time in which the heroes of the Russian novel lived. The whole Russian novel was written during the reign of Tsar Alexander II.
I will help you choose books of Russian classics for your reading in accordance with your level of knowledge of the Russian language. “Choosing books for one’s own and others’ reading is not only science, but also art. ”

На пробном уроке я определю ваш уровень языка, мы познакомимся поближе. Мы можем обсудить вашу цель изучения русского языка, вместе составим план по обучению. Вы можете рассказать, какие темы вам интересны, какие пробелы вы бы хотели подтянуть – разговорную речь, грамматику, аудирование, чтение.  Если вы совсем не говорите на русском, не волнуйтесь, я помогу вам представиться и немного рассказать о себе.

I’ll recognize your current level, we'll get to know each other better. We can discuss your goal of learning Russian, together we will draw up a training plan. You can tell what topics you are interested in, what gaps you would like to improve - speaking, grammar, listening, reading. If you don't speak Russian, don't worry, I'll help you introduce yourself and tell you a little about yourself.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian 0-А2 / Общий русский 0-А2
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson can include all aspects of the language such as speaking, listening, reading and writing, depending on your goals. 

Данный урок включает в себя отработку таких навыков, как говорение, аудирование, чтение и письмо. Урок основывается на Вашем уровне владения языка и Ваших целей.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Cases А1-А2 / Русские падежи А1-А2
pro_course_detail.description:
Курс для студентов, которые:
- только начали изучать падежи,
- уже изучали падежи, но хотят повторить их.
Вы узнаете, как использовать падежные формы в разных ситуациях.

This course is for students who:
- just started to study cases,
- have already studied cases, but want to repeat them.
You will learn how to use case forms in different situations.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Verbs 0-В1 / Русские глаголы 0-В1
pro_course_detail.description:
В этом курсе вы узнаете:
- как изменять русские глаголы 
- как использовать несовершенный и совершенный вид
- как образовать и использовать императив
- как строить сложные предложения
- как образовать и использовать причастия.

In this course, you will learn:
- how to change Russian verbs
- how to use the imperfect and perfect 
- how to form and use the imperative
- how to build complex sentences
- how to form and use participles forms

pro_course_detail.title: Язык анатомии
pro_course_detail.description:
На занятиях мы будем изучать основные органы и системы органов человека. Мы будем изучать новые слова по анатомии и грамматику, которая помогает рассказывать об организме человека. 
Урок включает лексику, грамматику, аудирование, чтение и говорение.
Занятия для всех, кто знает русский язык на уровне А1 и хочет учиться в медицинском университете в России.
